mods.abstract: Three color window card (orange, brown, and light blue on white) announcing the 1000 Guitars Festival celebrating the 43rd and 40th anniversaries of the National Anthem of Rock n Roll at Cheney Stadium on August 24. Poster features woodcuts of guitars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
